title: Microsoft Volume Licensing Agent 4.0
description:
An anonymous source gave me this a while back ago. It works, except for the fact that  Windows XP VLK keys don&#039;t validate as genuine.

I figured I&#039;d release it because I figure it&#039;s possible for hackers to reverse engineer it somehow and make something else that&#039;s even more useful.

With Vista out, Microsoft will care about this leak but won&#039;t go too crazy.

Enjoy and hack on!
